title: Pakistan’s Leader Went Ahead With Russia Visit Despite Push to Isolate Putin Over Ukraine
sub_head: Prime Minister Imran Khan met the Kremlin leader in Moscow just hours after Russia’s invasion of Ukraine began
body:
Among responses to Russia’s assault on Ukraine this week, Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan’s stood out: He pressed on with a visit to Russian President Vladimir Putin in Moscow amid Western efforts to isolate him.
“What a time to come, so much excitement,” a microphone caught Mr. Khan saying after he stepped off a plane to a red-carpet reception on Wednesday, just hours after Mr. Putin recognized two separatist regions of Ukraine as independent and ordered in his troops.
